data.actual_result: It shows users who you've already sent one.
data.expected_result: It should only give you suggestions of users you haven't sent a friend request so you can send one.
data.short_description: Users whose you've already sent a Friend Request appear as suggestion in Add Friends
data.steps_to_repro: - Interact with someone and send him a friend request from their profile. - Go to Friends -> Add Friend, and look at the suggestions (You need to have to new Add Friend Suggestions thing, currently available in only a few countries). - You'll see it gives you as suggestion the person who you've just sent it.
